name: Pew Pew Shapes
description:
Pew Pew Shapes is a chaotic game where one enemy dies, another one spawns! It can get messy very quickly, and you only have one minute to rack up the biggest score you can! Gain a point for shooting an enemy, lose a point for getting hit by one, and pick up the ammo scattered across the map! :D
